price: 34. Biarkan mereka mengingkari rahmat yang telah Kami berikan. Dan bersenang-senanglah kamu, maka kelak kamu akan mengetahui (akibat perbuatanmu).
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡۚ فَتَمَتَّعُواْ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum fatamattaʿū fasawfa taʿlamūna
